trans-unit.source: Hosts a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TextBox"></xref> control in a cell of a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle"></xref> for editing strings.
trans-unit.target: Hosts um <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TextBox"> </xref> controle em uma célula de uma <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle"> </xref> para edição de cadeias de caracteres.

trans-unit.source: The DataGridTextBoxColumn class derives from the `abstract` class <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle>.
trans-unit.target: A classe DataGridTextBoxColumn deriva o `abstract` class <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle>

trans-unit.source: At run time, the DataGridTextBoxColumn hosts a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBox> control that allows users to edit text.
trans-unit.target: No tempo de execução, os hosts DataGridTextBoxColumn um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBox>controle que permite aos usuários editar texto.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBox>

trans-unit.source: Special properties added to the class include <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBoxColumn.Format%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBoxColumn.HideEditBox%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Incluem propriedades especiais adicionadas à classe <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBoxColumn.Format%2A>e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBoxColumn.HideEditBox%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBoxColumn.HideEditBox%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBoxColumn.Format%2A>

trans-unit.source: These properties allow you to access the hosted <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBox> control and its attributes, and set the format for displaying values.
trans-unit.target: Essas propriedades permitem que você acesse hospedado <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBox>controle e seus atributos e o formato para exibir os valores do conjunto.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBox>

trans-unit.source: If the data source is a <xref:System.Data.DataTable> containing <xref:System.Data.DataColumn> objects, the <xref:System.Data.DataColumn.DataType%2A> property of the <xref:System.Data.DataColumn> should be set to a data type that can logically be edited in a text box control.
trans-unit.target: Se a fonte de dados for um <xref:System.Data.DataTable>contendo <xref:System.Data.DataColumn>objetos, o <xref:System.Data.DataColumn.DataType%2A>propriedade o <xref:System.Data.DataColumn>deve ser definido como um tipo de dados que pode ser editado logicamente em um controle de caixa de texto.</xref:System.Data.DataColumn> </xref:System.Data.DataColumn.DataType%2A> </xref:System.Data.DataColumn> </xref:System.Data.DataTable>

trans-unit.source: The following data types are automatically associated with a DataGridTextBoxColumn : <xref:System.Byte>, <xref:System.DateTime>, <xref:System.Decimal>, <xref:System.Double>, <xref:System.Int16>, <xref:System.Int32>, <xref:System.Int64>, <xref:System.UInt16>, <xref:System.UInt32>, <xref:System.UInt64>, <xref:System.Single>, and <xref:System.String>.
trans-unit.target: Os seguintes tipos de dados são associados automaticamente com um DataGridTextBoxColumn: <xref:System.Byte>, <xref:System.DateTime>, <xref:System.Decimal>, <xref:System.Double>, <xref:System.Int16>, <xref:System.Int32>, <xref:System.Int64>, <xref:System.UInt16>, <xref:System.UInt32>, <xref:System.UInt64>, <xref:System.Single>e <xref:System.String>.</xref:System.String> </xref:System.Single> </xref:System.UInt64> </xref:System.UInt32> </xref:System.UInt16> </xref:System.Int64> </xref:System.Int32> </xref:System.Int16> </xref:System.Double> </xref:System.Decimal> </xref:System.DateTime> </xref:System.Byte>

trans-unit.source: [Visual Basic] > [!NOTE] > The following types are not fully supported by Visual Basic: <xref:System.DateTime>, <xref:System.UInt16>, <xref:System.UInt32>, <xref:System.UInt64>, and <xref:System.TimeSpan>.
trans-unit.target: [Visual Basic] > [!NOTE] > os seguintes tipos não têm suporte total pelo Visual Basic: <xref:System.DateTime>, <xref:System.UInt16>, <xref:System.UInt32>, <xref:System.UInt64>e <xref:System.TimeSpan>.</xref:System.TimeSpan> </xref:System.UInt64> </xref:System.UInt32> </xref:System.UInt16> </xref:System.DateTime>

trans-unit.source: (Operators are not allowed.)
trans-unit.target: (Operadores não são permitidos).

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBoxColumn"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBoxColumn"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBoxColumn"></xref> with a specified <xref href="System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância de um <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBoxColumn"> </xref> com determinado <xref href="System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle> uses a <xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor> to determine the type of data displayed in the column.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle>usa um <xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor>para determinar o tipo de dados exibidos na coluna.</xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle>

trans-unit.source: To return a <xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptorCollection>, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase.GetItemProperties%2A> method of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase> class.
trans-unit.target: Para retornar um <xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptorCollection>use o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase.GetItemProperties%2A>método de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase>classe.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase.GetItemProperties%2A> </xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptorCollection>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor"></xref> for the column with which the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBoxColumn"></xref> will be associated.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor"> </xref> para a coluna com o qual o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBoxColumn"> </xref> será associado.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBoxColumn"></xref> class using the specified <xref href="System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBoxColumn"> </xref> classe usando especificado <xref href="System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Specifies whether the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBoxColumn"></xref> is a default column.
trans-unit.target: Especifica se o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBoxColumn"> </xref> é uma coluna padrão.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle> uses a <xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor> to determine the type of data displayed in the column.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle>usa um <xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor>para determinar o tipo de dados exibidos na coluna.</xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle>

trans-unit.source: To return a <xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptorCollection>, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase.GetItemProperties%2A> method of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase> class.
trans-unit.target: Para retornar um <xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptorCollection>use o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase.GetItemProperties%2A>método de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase>classe.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase.GetItemProperties%2A> </xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptorCollection>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor"></xref> to be associated with the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBoxColumn"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor"> </xref> sejam associados a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBoxColumn"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Specifies whether the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBoxColumn"></xref> is a default column.
trans-unit.target: Especifica se o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBoxColumn"> </xref> é uma coluna padrão.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBoxColumn"></xref> with the specified <xref href="System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor"></xref> and format.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância de um <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBoxColumn"> </xref> com especificado <xref href="System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor"> </xref> e formato.

trans-unit.source: Use this constructor to create a custom format for the displayed data.
trans-unit.target: Use este construtor para criar um formato personalizado para os dados exibidos.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle> uses a <xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor> to determine the type of data displayed in the column.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle>usa um <xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor>para determinar o tipo de dados exibidos na coluna.</xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle>

trans-unit.source: To return a <xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptorCollection>, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase.GetItemProperties%2A> method of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase> class.
trans-unit.target: Para retornar um <xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptorCollection>use o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase.GetItemProperties%2A>método de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase>classe.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase.GetItemProperties%2A> </xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptorCollection>

trans-unit.source: For more information about formatting characters, see [Formatting Types](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) and [Custom Date and Time Format Strings](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre a formatação de caracteres, consulte [tipos de formatação](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) e [Data personalizada e cadeias de caracteres de formato de hora](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor"></xref> for the column with which the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBoxColumn"></xref> will be associated.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor"> </xref> para a coluna com o qual o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBoxColumn"> </xref> será associado.

trans-unit.source: The format used to format the column values.
trans-unit.target: O formato usado para formatar os valores da coluna.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBoxColumn"></xref> class with a specified <xref href="System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor"></xref> and format.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBoxColumn"> </xref> classe com um especificado <xref href="System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor"> </xref> e formato.

trans-unit.source: Specifies whether the column is the default column.
trans-unit.target: Especifica se a coluna é a coluna padrão.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle> uses a <xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor> to determine the type of data displayed in the column.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle>usa um <xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor>para determinar o tipo de dados exibidos na coluna.</xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle>

trans-unit.source: To return a <xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptorCollection>, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase.GetItemProperties%2A> method of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase> class.
trans-unit.target: Para retornar um <xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptorCollection>use o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase.GetItemProperties%2A>método de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase>classe.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase.GetItemProperties%2A> </xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptorCollection>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor"></xref> to be associated with the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBoxColumn"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor"> </xref> sejam associados a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBoxColumn"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The format used.
trans-unit.target: O formato usado.

trans-unit.source: Specifies whether the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBoxColumn"></xref> is the default column.
trans-unit.target: Especifica se o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBoxColumn"> </xref> é a coluna padrão.

trans-unit.source: Initiates a request to interrupt an edit procedure.
trans-unit.target: Inicia uma solicitação para interromper um procedimento de edição.

trans-unit.source: This method rolls back any change made to the column and invokes the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBoxColumn.HideEditBox%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBoxColumn.EndEdit%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: Esse método reverterá qualquer alteração feita na coluna e invoca o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBoxColumn.HideEditBox%2A>e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBoxColumn.EndEdit%2A>métodos.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBoxColumn.EndEdit%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBoxColumn.HideEditBox%2A>

trans-unit.source: The number of the row in which an edit operation is being interrupted.
trans-unit.target: O número da linha na qual uma operação de edição está sendo interrompida.

trans-unit.source: Inititates a request to complete an editing procedure.
trans-unit.target: Inititates uma solicitação para concluir um procedimento de edição.

trans-unit.source: The method checks to ensure that an edit is indeed occurring.
trans-unit.target: O método verifica para garantir que uma edição de fato está ocorrendo.

trans-unit.source: If so, it formats the value appropriately.
trans-unit.target: Nesse caso, ele formata o valor adequadamente.

trans-unit.source: If the value is `null`, the method enters <xref:System.Convert.DBNull> into the column; otherwise, it uses the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.SetColumnValueAtRow%2A> method to commit the value.
trans-unit.target: Se o valor for `null`, insere o método <xref:System.Convert.DBNull>para a coluna; caso contrário, ele usa o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.SetColumnValueAtRow%2A>método para confirmar o valor.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.SetColumnValueAtRow%2A> </xref:System.Convert.DBNull>

trans-unit.source: The method is called by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid> when an editing operation is committed.
trans-unit.target: O método é chamado pelo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid>durante a edição de uma operação é confirmada.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager"></xref> of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid"></xref> control the column belongs to.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager"> </xref> do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid"> </xref> controle a coluna pertence.

trans-unit.source: The number of the edited row.
trans-unit.target: O número da linha editada.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the value was successfully committed; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o valor foi confirmado com êxito; Caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Informs the column that the focus is being conceded.
trans-unit.target: Informa a coluna que está sendo conceded o foco.

trans-unit.source: In this overridden method, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> control hosted by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBoxColumn> is hidden.
trans-unit.target: Neste método substituído, o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>controle hospedado pelo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBoxColumn>está oculto.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBoxColumn> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>

trans-unit.source: Prepares a cell for editing.
trans-unit.target: Prepara uma célula para edição.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.Edit%2A> sites a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> control on the grid at the location of the cell being edited.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.Edit%2A>sites um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>controle da grade no local da célula que está sendo editado.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.Edit%2A>

trans-unit.source: The method is called by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid> class's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.BeginEdit%2A> method when an editing operation is about to begin.
trans-unit.target: O método é chamado pelo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid>da classe <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.BeginEdit%2A>método quando uma operação de edição está prestes a começar.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.BeginEdit%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager"></xref> of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid"></xref> control the column belongs to.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager"> </xref> do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid"> </xref> controle a coluna pertence.

trans-unit.source: The row number in this column being edited.
trans-unit.target: O número de linha desta coluna que está sendo editado.

trans-unit.source: The bounding <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> in which the control is to be sited.
trans-unit.target: O delimitador <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"> </xref> na qual o controle a ser localizado.

trans-unit.source: A value indicating whether the column is a read-only.
trans-unit.target: Um valor que indica se a coluna é somente leitura.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the value is read-only; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o valor é somente leitura; Caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The text to display in the control.
trans-unit.target: O texto a ser exibido no controle.

trans-unit.source: A value indicating whether the cell is visible.
trans-unit.target: Um valor que indica se a célula estiver visível.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the cell is visible; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se a célula estiver visível; Caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Ends an edit operation on the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Termina uma operação de edição no <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: To edit the value of a cell, call the <xref:System.Data.DataRow> object's <xref:System.Data.DataRow.BeginEdit%2A> before changing the value.
trans-unit.target: Para editar o valor de uma célula, chame o <xref:System.Data.DataRow>do objeto <xref:System.Data.DataRow.BeginEdit%2A>antes de alterar o valor.</xref:System.Data.DataRow.BeginEdit%2A> </xref:System.Data.DataRow>

trans-unit.source: You must invoke the <xref:System.Data.DataRow.AcceptChanges%2A> method on both the <xref:System.Data.DataRow> and <xref:System.Data.DataTable> objects before the change is committed.
trans-unit.target: Você deve chamar o <xref:System.Data.DataRow.AcceptChanges%2A>método em ambos os <xref:System.Data.DataRow>e <xref:System.Data.DataTable>objetos antes da alteração é confirmada.</xref:System.Data.DataTable> </xref:System.Data.DataRow> </xref:System.Data.DataRow.AcceptChanges%2A>

trans-unit.source: Enters a <xref href="System.DBNull.Value"></xref> in the column.
trans-unit.target: Insere um <xref href="System.DBNull.Value"> </xref> na coluna.

trans-unit.source: Enters the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.NullText%2A> value into the cell.
trans-unit.target: Insere o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.NullText%2A>valor na célula.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.NullText%2A>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the character(s) that specify how text is formatted.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define os caracteres que especificam como o texto é formatado.

trans-unit.source: The Format property specifies how values are displayed in the column.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade de formato Especifica como os valores são exibidos na coluna.

trans-unit.source: For example, set the property to "c" to specify that the values will be formatted as the local currency.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, defina a propriedade como "c" para especificar que os valores serão formatados como moeda local.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> for the computer is used to determine the actual currency format.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>para o computador é usado para determinar o formato de moeda real.</xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>

trans-unit.source: The values are automatically unformatted to the native type when data is changed.
trans-unit.target: Os valores são automaticamente formatados para o tipo nativo quando dados são alterados.

trans-unit.source: For more information about formatting characters, see [Formatting Types](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) and [Custom Date and Time Format Strings](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre a formatação de caracteres, consulte [tipos de formatação](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) e [Data personalizada e cadeias de caracteres de formato de hora](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: The format you apply should be appropriate to the data type.
trans-unit.target: O formato que você aplicar deve ser apropriado para o tipo de dados.

trans-unit.source: For example, if the data is numeric in nature use one of the numeric format strings.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, se os dados forem numéricos por natureza use uma das cadeias de caracteres de formato numérico.

trans-unit.source: You can change the <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> for a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBoxColumn> by setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBoxColumn.FormatInfo%2A> property to a new <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> instance constructed with an appropriate culture ID.
trans-unit.target: Você pode alterar <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>para um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBoxColumn>, definindo a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBoxColumn.FormatInfo%2A>propriedade a uma nova <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>instância construído com uma cultura apropriada ID.</xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBoxColumn.FormatInfo%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBoxColumn> </xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>

trans-unit.source: To set the <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> for the application, set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.CurrentCulture%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application> object to a new <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> instance constructed with an appropriate culture ID.
trans-unit.target: Para definir o <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>para o aplicativo, defina a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.CurrentCulture%2A>propriedade do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application>objeto para uma nova <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>instância construída com uma ID de cultura apropriada</xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.CurrentCulture%2A> </xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>

trans-unit.source: The character or characters that specify how text is formatted.
trans-unit.target: Um ou mais caracteres que especificam como o texto é formatado.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the culture specific information used to determine how values are formatted.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define as informações específicas da cultura usadas para determinar como os valores são formatados.

trans-unit.source: When setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBoxColumn.Format%2A> property to one of the formatting characters, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBoxColumn> uses the information provided by the FormatInfo property to further specify what cultural-specific formatting to use.
trans-unit.target: Ao definir o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBoxColumn.Format%2A>propriedade com um dos caracteres de formatação, o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBoxColumn>usa as informações fornecidas pela propriedade FormatInfo é para especificar formatação que culturais específicos para usar.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBoxColumn> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBoxColumn.Format%2A>

trans-unit.source: For example, when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBoxColumn.Format%2A> property is set to the format character "c" (for currency), you can further specify that the symbol for the lira be used.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, quando o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBoxColumn.Format%2A>estiver definida como o caractere de formato "c" (para moeda), você também pode especificar que o símbolo para o lira seja usado.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBoxColumn.Format%2A>

trans-unit.source: To do this, create a new <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> object with the locale ID for Italy, and set the FormatInfo property to the new <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> object.
trans-unit.target: Para fazer isso, crie um novo <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>objeto com a ID de localidade para Itália e, em seguida, defina a propriedade FormatInfo é para o novo <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>objeto.</xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> </xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>

trans-unit.source: For more information about formatting characters, see [Formatting Types](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) and [Custom Date and Time Format Strings](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre a formatação de caracteres, consulte [tipos de formatação](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) e [Data personalizada e cadeias de caracteres de formato de hora](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: An object that implements the <xref:System.IFormatProvider> interface, such as the <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> class.
trans-unit.target: Um objeto que implementa a <xref:System.IFormatProvider>interface, como a <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>classe.</xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> </xref:System.IFormatProvider>

trans-unit.source: Gets the height of a cell in a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a altura de uma célula em uma <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The value returned by GetMinimumHeight is calculated by adding the size of the column's font plus a margin value.
trans-unit.target: O valor retornado por GetMinimumHeight é calculado adicionando-se o tamanho da fonte da coluna mais de um valor de margem.

trans-unit.source: The height of a cell.
trans-unit.target: A altura de uma célula.

trans-unit.source: Gets the height to be used in for automatically resizing columns.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a altura a ser usado para redimensionar automaticamente as colunas.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref> object used to draw shapes on the screen.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"> </xref> objeto usado para desenhar formas na tela.

trans-unit.source: The value to draw.
trans-unit.target: O valor para desenhar.

trans-unit.source: The height the cells automatically resize to.
trans-unit.target: A altura das células redimensionada automaticamente para.

trans-unit.source: Returns the optimum width and height of the cell in a specified row relative to the specified value.
trans-unit.target: Retorna a melhor largura e altura da célula em uma linha especificada em relação ao valor especificado.

trans-unit.source: The optimum width and height is calculated by measuring the string size, taking into account its font and attributes, and adding margin values.
trans-unit.target: A melhor largura e altura é calculado medindo o tamanho da cadeia de caracteres, levando em conta sua fonte e seus atributos e adicionar valores de margem.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref> object used to draw shapes on the screen.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"> </xref> objeto usado para desenhar formas na tela.

trans-unit.source: The value to draw.
trans-unit.target: O valor para desenhar.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Size"></xref> that contains the dimensions of the cell.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Drawing.Size"> </xref> que contém as dimensões da célula.

trans-unit.source: Hides the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBox"></xref> control and moves the focus to the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Oculta o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBox"> </xref> controlar e move o foco para o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid"> </xref> controle.

trans-unit.source: Paints the a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle"></xref> with the specified <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref>, <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref>, <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager"></xref>, and row number.
trans-unit.target: Pinta a um <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle"> </xref> com especificado <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"> </xref>, <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"> </xref>, <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager"> </xref>e o número de linha.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref> object to draw to.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"> </xref> objeto desenhar.

trans-unit.source: The bounding <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> to paint into.
trans-unit.target: O delimitador <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"> </xref> para pintar em.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager"></xref> of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid"></xref> the that contains the column.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager"> </xref> do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid"> </xref> que contém a coluna.

trans-unit.source: The number of the row in the underlying data table.
trans-unit.target: O número da linha na tabela de dados subjacente.

trans-unit.source: Paints a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle"></xref> with the specified <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref>, <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref>, <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager"></xref>, row number, and alignment.
trans-unit.target: Pinta uma <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle"> </xref> com especificado <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"> </xref>, <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"> </xref>, <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager"> </xref>, número de linha e o alinhamento.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBoxColumn.Paint%2A> method uses the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.GetColumnValueAtRow%2A> to determine the value to draw in the cell.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBoxColumn.Paint%2A>método usa o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.GetColumnValueAtRow%2A>para determinar o valor para desenhar na célula.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.GetColumnValueAtRow%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBoxColumn.Paint%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBoxColumn.PaintText%2A> method is called to draw the cell and its contents.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBoxColumn.PaintText%2A>método é chamado para desenhar a célula e seu conteúdo.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBoxColumn.PaintText%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref> object to draw to.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"> </xref> objeto desenhar.

trans-unit.source: The bounding <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> to paint into.
trans-unit.target: O delimitador <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"> </xref> para pintar em.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager"></xref> of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid"></xref> the that contains the column.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager"> </xref> do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid"> </xref> que contém a coluna.

trans-unit.source: The number of the row in the underlying data table.
trans-unit.target: O número da linha na tabela de dados subjacente.

trans-unit.source: A value indicating whether to align the column's content to the right.
trans-unit.target: Um valor que indica se alinhar o conteúdo da coluna à direita.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the content should be aligned to the right; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o conteúdo deve ser alinhado à direita; Caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Paints a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle"></xref> with the specified <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref>, <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref>, <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager"></xref>, row number, <xref href="System.Drawing.Brush"></xref>, and foreground color.
trans-unit.target: Pinta uma <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle"> </xref> com especificado <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"> </xref>, <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"> </xref>, <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager"> </xref>, linha número, <xref href="System.Drawing.Brush"> </xref>e a cor de primeiro plano.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBoxColumn.Paint%2A> method uses the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.GetColumnValueAtRow%2A> to determine the value to draw in the cell.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBoxColumn.Paint%2A>método usa o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.GetColumnValueAtRow%2A>para determinar o valor para desenhar na célula.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.GetColumnValueAtRow%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBoxColumn.Paint%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBoxColumn.PaintText%2A> method is called to draw the cell and its contents.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBoxColumn.PaintText%2A>método é chamado para desenhar a célula e seu conteúdo.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBoxColumn.PaintText%2A>

trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"> </xref> objeto desenhar.

trans-unit.target: O delimitador <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"> </xref> para pintar em.

trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager"> </xref> do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid"> </xref> que contém a coluna.

trans-unit.source: The number of the row in the underlying data table.
trans-unit.target: O número da linha na tabela de dados subjacente.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Brush"></xref> that paints the background.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Drawing.Brush"> </xref> que pinta o plano de fundo.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Brush"></xref> that paints the foreground color.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Drawing.Brush"> </xref> que pinta a cor de primeiro plano.

trans-unit.source: A value indicating whether to align the column's content to the right.
trans-unit.target: Um valor que indica se alinhar o conteúdo da coluna à direita.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the content should be aligned to the right; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o conteúdo deve ser alinhado à direita; Caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Draws the text and rectangle at the given location with the specified alignment.
trans-unit.target: Desenha o texto e um retângulo no local fornecido com o alinhamento especificado.

trans-unit.source: The PaintText method uses the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataFormats.Format> object set with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBoxColumn.Format%2A> property to format the value before drawing it to the screen.
trans-unit.target: O método PaintText usa o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataFormats.Format>objeto definido com o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBoxColumn.Format%2A>propriedade para formatar o valor antes do desenho-lo para a tela.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBoxColumn.Format%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataFormats.Format>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.Paint%2A> method calls the PaintText method.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.Paint%2A>método chama o método PaintText.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.Paint%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref> object used to draw the string.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"> </xref> objeto usado para desenhar a cadeia de caracteres.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> which contains the boundary data of the rectangle.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"> </xref> que contém os dados de limites do retângulo.

trans-unit.source: The string to be drawn to the screen.
trans-unit.target: A cadeia de caracteres a ser desenhada na tela.

trans-unit.source: A value indicating whether the text is right-aligned.
trans-unit.target: Um valor que indica se o texto é alinhado à direita.

trans-unit.source: Draws the text and rectangle at the specified location with the specified colors and alignment.
trans-unit.target: Desenha o texto e um retângulo no local especificado com as cores especificadas e o alinhamento.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBoxColumn.PaintText%2A> method uses the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBoxColumn.Format%2A> property to format the value before drawing it to the screen.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBoxColumn.PaintText%2A>método usa o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBoxColumn.Format%2A>propriedade para formatar o valor antes do desenho-lo para a tela.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBoxColumn.Format%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBoxColumn.PaintText%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.Paint%2A> method calls the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBoxColumn.PaintText%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.Paint%2A>chamadas de método de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBoxColumn.PaintText%2A>método.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBoxColumn.PaintText%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.Paint%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref> object used to draw the string.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"> </xref> objeto usado para desenhar a cadeia de caracteres.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> which contains the boundary data of the rectangle.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"> </xref> que contém os dados de limites do retângulo.

trans-unit.source: The string to be drawn to the screen.
trans-unit.target: A cadeia de caracteres a ser desenhada na tela.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Brush"></xref> that determines the rectangle's background color
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Drawing.Brush"> </xref> que determina a cor do plano de fundo do retângulo

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Brush"></xref> that determines the rectangles foreground color.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Drawing.Brush"> </xref> que determina a cor de primeiro plano retângulos.

trans-unit.source: A value indicating whether the text is right-aligned.
trans-unit.target: Um valor que indica se o texto é alinhado à direita.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor"></xref> for the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBoxColumn"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o <xref href="System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor"> </xref> para o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBoxColumn"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor"></xref> that formats the values displayed in the column.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor"> </xref> que formata os valores exibidos na coluna.

trans-unit.source: Sets a value indicating whether the text box column is read-only.
trans-unit.target: Define um valor que indica se a coluna de caixa de texto é somente leitura.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the text box column is read-only; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se a coluna de caixa de texto é somente leitura; Caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Removes the reference that the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid"></xref> holds to the control used to edit data.
trans-unit.target: Remove a referência que o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid"> </xref> mantém o controle usado para editar os dados.

trans-unit.source: This method removes the reference that the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid> holds to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBox> control, in order to free system resources.
trans-unit.target: Este método remove a referência que o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid>mantém o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBox>controle para liberar recursos do sistema.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBox> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid>

trans-unit.source: Adds a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TextBox"></xref> control to the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid"></xref> control's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection>.
trans-unit.target: Adiciona um <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TextBox"> </xref> o controle para o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid"> </xref> controle <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection>

trans-unit.source: When this methods is called, the hosted <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> control is added to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid> control's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection>.
trans-unit.target: Quando esse método é chamado, o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>controle é adicionado ao <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid>controle <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> de hospedado

trans-unit.source: This allows the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager> to associate both controls with the same data source.
trans-unit.target: Isso permite que o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager>para associar os dois controles com a mesma fonte de dados.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid"></xref> control the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TextBox"></xref> control is added to.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid"> </xref> controle o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TextBox"> </xref> controle for adicionado ao.

trans-unit.source: Gets the hosted <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TextBox"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o hospedado <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TextBox"> </xref> controle.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TextBox"></xref> control hosted by the column.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TextBox"> </xref> controle hospedado pela coluna.

trans-unit.source: Updates the user interface.
trans-unit.target: Atualiza a interface do usuário.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager"></xref> that supplies the data.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager"> </xref> que fornece os dados.

trans-unit.source: The index of the row to update.
trans-unit.target: O índice da linha para atualizar.

trans-unit.source: The text that will be displayed in the cell.
trans-unit.target: O texto que será exibido na célula.
